title: The Hunting of the Snark: An Agony in Eight Fits
description: A beautifully re-interpreted edition of Lewis Carroll's unforgettable story: "the impossible voyage of an improbable crew to find an inconeivable creature."The master of nonsense, Lewis Carroll, re-interpreted in a fabulous new edition. A lovely gift book, and a delight to share, and read aloud.
author: Lewis Carroll
